subject: Re: [junit] Anyon else interested in Emacs support for junit
msgSnippet: ... Maybe you could upload it to the files section of this group? Johannes
messageBody:
"Simon A. Crase" wrote:
>
> I have written a simple emacs extension to create a test case class, add
> tests, and insert assertEquals/assertTrue. If anyone else is interested,
> I'll write some doco and make the code available. If not, I'll just do
> enough doco for my own team.
>
> Cheers,

Maybe you could upload it to the files section of this group?

Johannes
